column2: ggplot(mapaES2) + geom_sf(aes(fill = Total), color = "black", linewidth = 0.1) + scale_fill_continuous(low="ivory",high="skyblue4", labels = scales::label_comma(big.mark = "."), guide = guide_colorbar(frame.colour = "black", ticks.colour = "gray89")) + theme_void() + labs(title = "Número de aves de corral por CC.AA. (2020)",fill="Nº de cabezas") + theme(plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 11))
